mapper.select: SELECT o.FG_ORDER_DATE AS fgOrderDate, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_ROOT AS fgProductFileRoot, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_NAME AS fgProductFileName, p.FG_PRODUCT_NAME AS fgProductName, p.FG_PRODUCT_PRICE AS fgProductPrice, pick.FG_PICKUP_SCHEDULE AS fgPickupSchedule, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME AS fgBusinessName, pick.FG_PICKUP_REQUEST AS fgPickupRequest, pick.FG_PICKUP_STATUS AS fgPickupStatus, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_UUID AS fgProductFileUuid, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_ID AS fgProductFileId FROM FG_ORDER o, FG_PICKUP pick, FG_PRODUCT p, FG_PRODUCT_FILE pf, FG_BUSINESS b WHERE o.FG_ORDER_ID = pick.FG_ORDER_ID AND o.FG_PRODUCT_ID = p.FG_PRODUCT_ID AND p.FG_PRODUCT_ID = pf.FG_PRODUCT_ID AND p.FG_BUSINESS_ID = b.FG_BUSINESS_ID AND o.FG_USER_CODE = #{fgUserCode}
